content: materials our prism blanket in morning bundle 1 comes in crib throw sizes and includes 8 15 skeins of purl soho s morning 2 75% organically grown cotton and 25% yak each skein of this light worsted/dk-weight yarn is 191 yards/ 100 grams - main color mc 4 7 skeins approximately 760 1265 total yards required - contrast color 1 cc1 1 2 skein s approximately 185 310 total yards required - contrast color 2 cc2 1 2 skein s approximately 185 310 total yards required - contrast color 3 cc3 1 2 skein s approximately 185 310 total yards required - contrast color 4 cc4 1 2 skein s approximately 185 310 total yards required you ll also need… - us 7 4 5 mm 24-inch circular knitting needles 3 choose from three colorful palettes 4 we used surfboard for our crib sample gauge 20 stitches and 40 row 20 ridges = 4 inches in garter stitch sizes crib throw finished dimensions 30 inches wide x 40 inches long 40 inches wide x 50 inches long finished dimensions of each square 10 inches square interested in knitting a wool version instead check out our original prism blanket pattern 5 designed for good wool 6 designed for purl soho by joelle hoverson 7 and gaby bush 8 1 https //www purlsoho com/prism-blanket-in-morning-bundle html 2 https //www purlsoho com/morning html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles html 4 https //www purlsoho com/prism-blanket-in-morning-bundle html 5 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/prism-blanket-2 6 https //www purlsoho com/good-wool html 7 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/joelle-hoverson-for-purl-soho/ 8 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/gaby-bush-for-purl-soho/
